result.eng: I had to use all my strength.
result.ga: bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáid
result.orig: bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáid
result.html: bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáidI had to use all my strength.
result.ponchtml: ḃí orm iomlán mo nirt a ċur in úsáidI had to use all my strength.

result.eng: The county's football team is going from strength to strength.
result.ga: tá foireann peile an chontae ag dul ó neart go neart
result.orig: tá foireann peile an chontae ag dul ó neart go neart
result.html: tá foireann peile an chontae ag dul ó neart go neartThe county's football team is going from strength to strength.
result.ponchtml: tá foireann peile an ċontae ag dul ó neart go neartThe county's football team is going from strength to strength.

result.eng: There is strength and energy in me.
result.ga: tá neart agus fuinneamh ionam
result.orig: tá neart agus fuinneamh ionam
result.html: tá neart agus fuinneamh ionamThere is strength and energy in me.
result.ponchtml: tá neart agus fuinneaṁ ionamThere is strength and energy in me.
